casebody.data:
2002-1886 (La. 10/25/02)

AMERICAN BANK AND TRUST COMPANY OF COUSHATTA v. BOGGS AND THOMPSON PROFESSIONAL LAW CORPORATION and A. Michael Boggs. No. 2002-C-1886. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re American Bank & Trust Company of Coushatta;—Plaintiff; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Bossier, 26th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 102,073; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 36,157-CA.

Denied.
